phenotype.script:
<?php
class PhenotypeContent_1102 extends PhenotypeContent
{
  // Form entry
  var $content_type = 1102;
  var $skins = Array(); // allowed skins
  
  function setDefaultProperties()
  {
      $this->set("bez","New Entry");
      $this->set("datum",time());    
  }
  
  function init($row,$block_nr=0) 
  { 
    parent::init($row,$block_nr); 
     
    $this->form_textarea("Mail","mail",400,20);
 
  }
  
  function attachKeyFields()
  {
    $this->setKey1($this->get("datum"));
  }
  
  function buildFullText()
  {
  	return ($this->get("mail"));
  }
  

}
?>
